description: Make a healthier cafe-quality sandwich at home in 15 minutes. Our dill yoghurt, pickled carrot, goat's cheese and salad sandwich is the perfect work lunch.
keywords: Salad sandwich,Zucchini,Healthier Easier,Quick & easy lunch,Jan Feb 2022,Quick & easy,Spinach
name: Super Salad Sandwich Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 slices Woolworths 7 seeds & grains hi fibre low GI loaf
1 Macro Organic cooked ready to eat beetroot, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Combine fennel seeds, honey and 1/4 cup boiling water in small bowl. Add carrot and allow to pickle for 5 minutes. Drain.
Combine yoghurt and dill in another small bowl. Season with pepper.

Spread yoghurt mixture over 1 side of each bread slice, then top 1 bread slice with zucchini, cabbage, pickled carrot, cheese, beetroot and spinach. Sandwich with remaining bread slice. Cut in half and serve.
